mapper.select: SELECT EMP_ID AS empId , PW AS pw , SALT AS salt , KOR_NM AS korNm , ENG_NM AS engNm , EMAIL AS email , CELLPHONE AS cellPhone , HIRE_DT AS hireDt , RETIREMENT_DT AS retirementDt , STATE AS state , ANNUAL AS annual , DEPT_ID AS deptId , JOB_ID AS deptId , POSITION_ID AS positionId , MANAGER_ID AS managerId , AUTHORITY AS authority , SALARY AS salary , REG_DT AS regDt , UP_DT AS upDt , EMP_IMG AS empImg FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = #{userId}
